message: Let's be reasonable, 60% for me is a good starting point.
Your turn to be reasonable Alice.  I'm feeling generous today.
Meet me in the middle, I've come down from 60%.
The clock is ticking Alice.  Let's split the difference and end this.
Getting closer, I'll meet you a bit closer to the middle.
This is more than fair Alice, take it before inflation eats our profits!
